name: Panoround SANTORINI, the most beautiful places on CD-Rom.
description:
Discover Santorini in your living room. You select the focus.
360 degree movies in a brilliant resolution show every detail.

CONTENT:
Harbour of Skala, Fira, Thira, Bay of Ammouthi, Meeting of the romanticists at sunset in Oia, harbours of Armeni and Ammoudi, Light-house of Faros, Pyrgos, the Red Beach, Kamari with its beautiful dark beach, the manor house Archontiko Argyrou in Messaria, Village of Manolas, the island of Nea Kameni.

About 60 Min. QTVR-Movies, Images, maps and legends
Language: English, German and Greek.

ISBN 3902388927 / 2st Edition
